column4: Anyone using a Dell Vostro 3300? Just wanna know about your lspci what's their wireless chipset.
what does it matter what theres is, yours is what interess you
is because I'm thinking about buying a Vostro 3300. Wanna know if I'll have problems with it on Linux or not. That's why I wanna know. ;]
contact the vendor then, and ask them
